CustomField.description: Guidance text for Opportunity - stage dependant
CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName , 'Draft'), $Label.Opportunity_Guidance_Draft, IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName , 'In progress'), $Label.Opportunity_Guidance_InProgress, IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName , 'Customer'), $Label.Opportunity_Guidance_Customer, IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName , 'Approved'), $Label.Opportunity_Guidance_Approved, 'No guidance available'))))
CustomField.label: Guidance Information
